name: MemoryRetrievalAgent
description: MemoryRetrievalAgent is an AI-powered assistant designed to retrieve relevant memory entries based on a user-provided task. It reads configuration files, initializes the Memory client (mem0), searches for pertinent information, and returns the retrieved memory entries.

inputs.name: task
inputs.description: The user-provided task or query that the agent uses to retrieve relevant memory entries.

outputs.name: memory_retrieval_result
outputs.description: A list of memory entries retrieved by the agent based on the input task.
